kv13.8:1.3_1: atthi keci dukkhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti,
kv13.8:1.5_1: atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
kv13.8:1.7_1: atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:2.7_1: dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anuseti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:3.5_0: “so evaṁ anurodhavirodhaṁ samāpanno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedayati sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā,
kv13.8:3.5_1: so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
